# Update Group

# Description

Uses the Update Group - PUT API to update a group in Zendesk.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

* 
* Group ID - The ID of the group. Either the group ID or the group name can be selected from the dropdown list. This field supports Int64 type input.
* Name - The updated name of the group. This field supports String type input.
* Description - The description of the group. This field supports String type input.









* Group - Automatically generated output variable.
